body:
Comment 2: 
The use of import "C" in package.go does not work and is unlikely to ever work.  You
can't have a package that is both cgo and SWIG.

With https://golang.org/cl/14369043 your code works.

For 1.3 we are going to have to change SWIG itself to support external linking, and then
change the go tool to use that rather than shared libraries.
